category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MciPMIXmlDataset_Details
preference.preference_description: Defines the relation of the owning item with the Product Manufacturing Information (PMI) XML dataset, the dataset type and the named reference to be used. The format for Valid Values: "Relation:DatasetType:NamedReference", e.g. "Mci0PMIXmlRel:Mci0PMIXml:Mci0ipxml".
